message: Here in the US this weekend, daylight savings time went into effect. With springing ahead an hour, how well did you adjust to the change?  Personally, there isn't enough coffee in the world to convince my mind and body that I got up at "7am"....how about you?
Also there was a bunch of stuff I didn't know in this article:
So far my body is doing ok though. Assuming the 3 or 4 o'clock slump is going to be worse than usual!
I didn't remember it being THAT dark at 6:45am!
I had no clue that the time change even happened until someone told me. My phone and computers all changed automagically so I just went about my day clueless until someone made a comment about it
It sucks that I went to bed when it was dark, and then woke up while it was still dark. :-(
Ok today is worse. Feels like 5:50am. Grumble grumble.....
